reference.shortdesc: The glossgroup is a specialized topic that can contain multiple glossentry topics within a single document.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <glossgroup id="things" xml:lang="en"> <title>Some terms</title> <glossentry id="bicycle"> <glossterm>bicycle</glossterm> <glossdef>Human powered mode of transport with two wheels</glossdef> </glossentry> <glossentry id="fruitbat"> <glossterm>Fruit bat</glossterm> <glossdef>A bat which likes fruit</glossdef> </glossentry> </glossgroup>
